org.vanted.scaling.vanted

Class GraphScaler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanted.scaling.vanted.GraphScaler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener, SessionListener

    public class GraphScaler
extends java.lang.Object
implements SessionListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    Responsible for the synchronization between scaling and the established graph zooming, which acts as graph scaling.
    Author:
    dim8
